subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] Quikscript extensions to Shavian (or separate script)
msgSnippet: ... Who is Tremblay and why should we care? The Unicode guys still find the Runic names annoying. Michael Everson * http://www.evertype.com/
messageBody:
On 20 Apr 2013, at 18:23, John Cowan <cowan@...> wrote:

> The Read chart uses the names Pea, Bay, Tea, ..., which your proposal adopts; the Tremblay chart uses the names Pipe, Bob, Tut, ... in Shavian style.

Who is Tremblay and why should we care?

The Unicode guys still find the Runic names annoying.

Michael Everson * http://www.evertype.com/
